document.full_text: pakistan's exiled former president pervez musharraf plans to return to his country next year, despite facing possible arrest, in order to participate in a 2013 election, he told reporters on friday.
document.title: pakistan's musharraf vows to return for 2013 poll
lines_and_colors: pakistan's exiled former president pervez musharraf plans to return to his country next year, despite facing possible arrest, in order to participate in a 2013 election, he told reporters on friday.
